card.name: Heartpiercer Shade
card.text: {B}{R}: Create an Arrow token and attach it to this creature. (It's an Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Archons of Drenz
card.text: Flying Instants and sorcery spells cost {1} less to cast during your main phase. Volley — When you cast a noncreature spell create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. This ability triggers only if you attacked with two or more creatures this turn.

card.name: Queen of Strings
card.text: Haste, Deathtouch Instant and Sorcery spells you cast during your main-phase have Ambush 1. (As that spell resolves, create a 1/1 red and white Archer creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Vengeful Nymph
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, create an Arrow token. (It's an Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0. card.name: Boglands Guide
card.text: Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, target player loses 1 life. Volley — {1}{U}{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn where X is the number of arrows you control. Activate only if you attacked with two or more creatures this turn.

card.name: Patient Hunt
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature had power 2 or less, Scry 1.

card.name: Maiden of Mahjordan
card.text: When this creature enters, create two Arrow tokens. (It's an Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +1/+0. card.name: Artetian Beastmaster
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may create a copy of a creature token you control. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the end of combat.

card.name: Longshot Master
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you created a token this turn, Longshot Master deals 1 damage to target player. {T}: Add {U}{R}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts you control.

card.name: Seek the Wilderness
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle. Ambush 1 (Create a1/1 red and white Archer creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Drenz Gloryseeker
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap up to X target creatures where X is the number of artifacts that entered the battlefield under your control this turn. Drenz Gloryseeker can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Foolish Challenge
card.text: Target player sacrifices a nontoken creature they control. Ambush 1 (Create a 1/1 red and white Archer creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Surprise Attack
card.text: Up to two target creatures you control get +2/+1 and have "When you attack, untap this creature" until end of turn. Ambush 2 (Create two 1/1 red and white Archer creature tokens with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
